law.catch_line: Clerks to send notices to State Board of Elections on incompetency determinations.
law.text: Each circuit clerk shall send certified notices of incompetency to the State Board of Elections within ten (10) days after the determination has become final with regard to any person before the courts of the county.
law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 341, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1988.
